mapper.select: SELECT m_no, m_id, m_name, m_tel, m_email, m_img, to_char(m_year, 'yyyy-MM-dd') m_year, l_bookid, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lo_book WHERE l_memno = ( SELECT m_no FROM sl_member WHERE m_id = #{m_id} ) AND l_return_yn = 'N' ) lo_book_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM re_book WHERE r_memno = ( SELECT m_no FROM sl_member WHERE m_id = #{m_id} AND r_reservation >= 0 ) ) re_book_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lo_book WHERE l_memno = ( SELECT m_no FROM sl_member WHERE m_id = #{m_id} ) ) total_cnt FROM sl_member, lo_book, re_book WHERE m_id = #{m_id} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT l_memno, l_bookid, b_name, b_author, b_pub, b_year, b_category, b_isbn, b_url, to_char(l_lodate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') l_lodate, to_char(l_retdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') l_retdate, l_return_yn, l_renew_yn, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sl_member, lo_book WHERE m_no = l_memno AND l_memno = #{l_memno} AND l_return_yn = 'N' ) lo_book_cnt FROM sl_book, lo_book WHERE l_memno = #{l_memno} AND b_id = l_bookid AND l_return_yn = 'N'

SELECT l_bookid, b_name, b_author, b_pub, b_year, b_category, b_isbn, b_url, to_char(l_lodate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') l_lodate, to_char(l_retdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') l_retdate, to_char(l_complete, 'yyyy-MM-dd') l_complete, l_return_yn, l_renew_yn, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sl_member, lo_book WHERE m_no = l_memno AND l_memno = #{l_memno} ) lo_book_cnt FROM sl_book, lo_book WHERE l_memno = #{l_memno} AND b_id = l_bookid
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM re_book WHERE r_bookid = #{r_bookid}
SELECT l_renew_yn FROM lo_book WHERE l_memno =#{l_memno} AND l_return_yn = 'N' AND l_bookid = #{l_bookid}
SELECT b_category as category, COUNT(b_category) AS total_cnt FROM lo_book a, sl_book b WHERE l_memno = #{l_memno} AND l_bookid = b_id GROUP BY b_category

SELECT to_char(l_lodate, 'yyyy.MM') AS category, COUNT(to_char(l_lodate, 'yyyy.MM')) as TOTAL_CNT FROM lo_book WHERE l_memno = #{l_memno} AND l_lodate >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) GROUP BY to_char(l_lodate, 'yyyy.MM') ORDER BY to_char(l_lodate, 'yyyy.MM')

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(l_lodate)) as category, COUNT(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(l_lodate))) as TOTAL_CNT FROM lo_book WHERE l_memno = #{l_memno} GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(l_lodate)) ORDER BY category
